org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

Class DataStreamSink<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.SingleOutputStreamOperator<IN,DataStreamSink<IN>>
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStreamSink<IN>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type of the DataStream closed by the sink.

    public class DataStreamSink<IN>
extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<IN,DataStreamSink<IN>>
    Represents the end of a DataStream.
